name: @cryptocelts/monorepo
description: CryptoCelt is just CeltNFT/GreenFalCoin Creat/Airdrop/Marketing Page
author: Andrei K

scripts.nft:convert-layers-csv: cd packages/nft-res-generator/src/generator && deno run --import-map ./import_map.json -A Drakefile.ts convert-layers-csv layersCsvPath=input-rarity-table.csv outputJsonPath=assets/layers.json
scripts.nft:generate-metadata: cd packages/nft-res-generator/src/generator && rm -rf build && deno run --import-map ./import_map.json -A Drakefile.ts generate-metadata
scripts.nft:generate-car: cd packages/nft-res-generator && yarn ipfs-car --pack ./generator/build/images --output ./generator/build/image.car && yarn ipfs-car --pack ./generator/build/metadata --output ./generator/build/metadata.car
scripts.hh:build: cd packages/blockchain && npx hardhat compile --force && cd .. && yarn typechain:build
scripts.hh:deploy:local: cd packages/blockchain && npx hardhat run --network localhost scripts/deploy.ts && cd .. && yarn typechain:build
scripts.hh:deploy:rinkeby: cd packages/blockchain && npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy.ts && cd .. && yarn typechain:build
scripts.hh:deploy:emerald_testnet: cd packages/hardhat && npx hardhat run --network emerald_testnet scripts/deploy.ts && cd .. && yarn typechain:build
scripts.hh:deploy:emerald_mainnet: cd packages/hardhat && npx hardhat run --network emerald_mainnet scripts/deploy.ts && cd .. && yarn typechain:build
scripts.crypto-celts:build: cd packages/app && yarn build && cd build && git add . && git commit -m 'update' && git push -f
